Directions: In a bowl, combine the first six ingredients.  In another bowl, combine the egg, milk, applesauce and oil.  Stir into dry ingredients just until moistened.  Fill four greased muffin cups two-thirds full.  Bake at 400 degrees F for 12-15 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.  Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pan to a wire rack.  Serve warm.
